June 9, 2021November 21, 2020 by Brayden
2.2k
SHARES
ShareTweet

Welding machines have evolved over the past few years and made welding process easy and more convenient. Yet it can be a tough decision for any beginner to select the best welder.

No matter whether you are a professional welder or need the best welder for your household purposes, these tools are handy and help all of us to save our time and money. So here are the personally researched and reviewed some of the best welders for beginners.

Here’s a list of top 10 welder for beginners with their reviews:

Best Tig for Beginner

AHP AlphaTIG 200X

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 19 x 23 x 12 inches
  • Weight: 69 pounds
  • Power Source: Arc
  • Handle: Plastic (For extra safety)
  • Input Power: 110/220V
  • Output Range: 120A
  • Duty Cycle: 60%
Check On Amazon

The AHP AlphaTIG 200X is the best welder for beginner. Why? Well here is the first reason that we have called this as the best Tig Welder for beginner because it is superb in quality, affordable, and best beginners Tig welding machine for aluminum, stainless steel, and for stick welding.

Dual voltage with 60% duty cycles, you can hardly have any single issue while using this welding machine as a beginner.

The Alpha TIG 200X is an excellent and flexible welding machine which is extremely easy to use. It’s best beginners Tig welder for aluminum and stainless and switching to AC/DC mode is also simple with just one button present on the front of the machine.

It is famous for creating smooth arcs and supports pulse frequency which reduces the risk of burning and provides 3-years of warranty and includes a New Torch as well.

The most useful thing that a user will find after buying this product is High-Frequency Start and a foot pedal included in the box in such a reasonable price unit.

It is an outstanding machine to practice and perform extremely heavy duty welds at the same time as it offers little bit complex controls and buttons on the front which are little bit confusing for the beginner but as you’ll search about them and get to know about them you’ll find that you have made the best decision by buying this kind of machine as it will be helpful in the future as well.

Forgot to mention that the foot pedal is extremely premium with metal finish to give highest precise control possible and the weight is also not too much to carry it easily.

So it is an overall best welder for beginners and according to us if you need to have a professional Tig/Stick welding machine for beginners which you can use for heavy duty welds as well then it is the best option to go for as beginner. Absolutely recommended!

  • Excellent arc quality

3-in-1 beginner welder

PrimeWeld CT-520D

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 23.58 x 16.81 x 12.8 inches; 35.7 Pounds
  • Weight: 57 pounds
  • Input Power: 120/230V
  • Output Range: 20-220A
  • Duty Cycle: 60%
Check On Amazon

PrimeWeld CT-520D is the top of the line and the best welder for beginner. It offers 3-in-1 combo of a 50 Amp Plasma Cutter, 200 Amp TIG Welder and 200 Amp Stick Welder which makes it the best starter welder as well as best beginner tig welder.

According to us, this is the must have welder if you are just starting out. It provides a foot pedal to get premium and controlled welds and offers Heat and High Frequency start by hand which is a cool feature in this prices range and in this kind of welder.

It easily welds all kind of metals like Aluminum, Magnesium , Alloy, Mild steel, Copper, Stainless steel, cast iron, and its combo makes it further more better option in terms of its competitor in similar price range.

It is powerful welding machine which means that it can easily perform heavy duty-industrial tasks and leaves no spatters behind. TIG/Stick, Plasma cutting and Arc welding provides this welder an edge over the all other welders in its own price range.

It also offers a dual voltage which means that it can be plugged into any kind of power supply and starts instantly.

The duty cycle is also highest amongst all the competitors in current category with 60% at 75Amps and also comes with 3-years warranty to provide peace of mind to the user.

Best Mig for Beginner

Hobart 500559 Handler 140

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 19 x 11 x 13“
  • Weight: 57 pounds
  • Power Source: Corded-electric
  • Input Power: 115V
  • Output Range: 25-140A
  • Duty Cycle: 20%
Check On Amazon

If you are a beginner MIG welder and searching for extremely premium quality welder, then this product will definitely be a best decision as it works on standard 115v household current and offers 5-position-voltage control to provide complete control over the machine.

As a beginner, the person first looks for all those features which he or she can get in a single machine and in low price, and then switch to more advance and heavy machine which this Hobart 500559 already provides.

It is a lightweight and most popular best MIG welder for beginners that provides option to the user to select voltage and wire feed speed which is extremely handy when doing low or high welding tasks.

Just you need to give few minutes of rest to the machine after few minutes of usage as it offers the safety feature that is built-in in this MIG welder to overcome the heating issue and it is extremely durable machine which is built with Steel, Stainless Steel, and Aluminum.

Plus it is a machine which is quickly shipped and give’s no issue in the start and in long run and provides 5 years of warranty as well to give peace of mind to the customer.

So it is definitely a solid welding machine that must be considered if you are looking for the best welder for beginners.

AC/DC Tig for Beginner

Hobart 500551 EZ-TIG 165i

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 17 x 9.9 x 23.9″
  • Weight: 60 pounds
  • Input Power: 230V
  • Output Range: 10-165A
  • Duty Cycle: 20%
Check On Amazon

Hobart 500551 is the best beginner tig welder as we are specifying along with each of the product that which one is a TIG welder and which one is a MIG welder machine.

As we all know that Tig welding is little bit complex but provides extremely quality finish so Hobart 500551 comes in as the best tig welding machine for beginners due to its extremely user-friendly controls and ease of use.

It is the welding machine that will definitely suit all your needs due to its AC and DC functionality which can easily weld simple as well as oxidized metals such as Aluminum at the same time and comes with infinite controllable amperage range to weld more materials.

It is a machine that will definitely cover all your needs, from commercial to household, as company has made this product for all kind of users.

We all know HF start, Fan on demand, AC/DC functionalities, and Hobart 500551 provides all of these cool features to give the best product to its end user and get no complaint regarding the quality.

AC/DC Tig for Beginner

Weldpro MIG155Gsv

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 14.96 x 13.58 x 6.69 inches
  • Weight: 21.2 pounds
  • Warranty: 2-years
  • Input Power: 120//20V
  • Output power: 155 Amps
Check On Amazon

The Weldpro MIG155Gsv is the most powerful and best mig welder for beginners. IT is a  MIG/Stick Arc TIG welder that is ideal for entry level welder and wants to learn directly on a well featured and great quality welding machine.

The first and the most powerful feature of this beginner Welder is that it provide dual voltage which means that it can work on 110/115 and 220/230 Voltages at 155amps output power which makes it capable for carrying out heavy duty industrial welds.

Adjustable wire feed speed and heat control feature of this best welder for beginner is truly remarkable and best beginner mig welder.

The WeldPro MIG155Gsv is a 3-in-1 welder machine that can operate on gas MIG, flux core and stick processes and can make it as a TIG welder as well after ordering few other parts.

The most remarkable feature of this MIG welder is that it can adjust itself according to the material type through electronic reaction circuit to produce extremely professional welds.

The Weldpro MIG155Gsv is one the most trustable product due to its company reputation and quick and fast customer support and never gives any kinds of lags and problems in the longer run as well.

Accessories are good and user can find all the basic accessories already included in the box like hose, gas regulator, MIG torch and a stick arc electrode holder.

For extra convenience and satisfying buying Weldpro provides 2 years of warranty period which is sufficient to find any problem in the start and resolve it from the company end.

Additionally it is compact and portable and extremely lightweight unit with only 21 pound weight which is nothing for such kind of welder.

According to us it can the best option if you are searching for the best welder for beginners as it provides almost everything that a heavy duty and extremely high priced welder can have and also provides over-heat and over-current protection.

So this one is definitely the best option for best welder for beginners as it is not only energy saving, but also provides short circuit protection and has high duty cycles as well due to which it never gets overheated and never breaks downs the operation.

If you are new in welding you may also looking for best cheap tig welders.

  • TIG compatible
  • Adjustable wire speed and heat control
  • Premium accessories
  • Dual Voltages
  • Extremely affordable
  • 2-years Warranty
Cons
  • Little bit compromise on wire feeding

Amazon’s Choice

Forney Easy Weld 261

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 16.7 x 12 x 8.1 inches
  • Weight: 19 pounds
  • Warranty: 1-year
  • Input Power: 120 20Hz
  • Output power: 140 Amps
  • Duty Cycle: 30% at 90Amp
Check On Amazon

The electric shock protection compatible, Forney Easy Weld 261 is an outstanding option and best welder for amateurs as it is easy to setup and performs the required welding with extra premium feature which is glasses/fluxed core welding which prevents oxidation in the welding parts hence producing extremely precise and clean welds.

Another cool thing is that you can get all these features for low price which are usually not available in such price. It is an ideal welding machine for DIY, maintenance, and repairs and the best hobbyist welder.

As discussed earlier it is extremely powerful machine as if you want to know the power of any welder then must check the output power which 140 Amps of this welding machine which means that it can easily weld heavy duty metals with no issue at all.

It’s only 19 pound welding machine so you will not have any issue in this department as well. It includes 8 foot MIG gun and Torch Wrap which will also help you in welding long distance weldings and in the night as well.

Apart from this, the Forney Easy Weld 261 is the best Mig/Stick welder for beginners, like others, includes overload and overheat protection.

  • Affordable
  • Infinite voltage and wire feed speed control
  • Heavy-duty 8-foot MIG gun
  • Lightweight and portable
  • Ideal for amateurs
  • 1-year warranty

Multiprocess Welder

Lincoln Electric K4195-1

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 29.02 x 10.51 x 5.98 inches
  • Weight: 11.97 pounds
  • Input Power: 120/230V 60Hz
  • Output Range: 20-220A
  • Duty Cycle: 25%
Check On Amazon

As Lincoln Electric K4195-1 full name, “Lincoln Electric POWER MIG 210 MP Multi-Process Welder Aluminum” itself suggests that this beginner MIG welder is multi process welder and extremely powerful as well.

This is the perfect welder for beginners as it offers dual voltages i.e. 120V or 230V which means that you are not going to face any issue regarding the power supply and can plug into any power supply and start using it.

Along with MIG welding, it also offers stick, TIG and flux-cored welding which increases the options of welding and makes it the best welder for beginner. Another cool thing is that, it is even more lighter than the Forney Easy Weld 298 with only 11.97 pounds.

Now coming towards the more advance features that really matters while selecting the best welder for beginner, it includes Magnum PRO 100SG Spool Gun of extremely premium quality which gives outstanding welds which is the basic requirement of any welder.

Apart from this, the brand itself claims that it is the ideal MIG machine for the novice and it’s easy to set up this machine and achieve normal welding tasks.

Like above, it also has wire feed speed control and voltage control function so that you can easily weld metals of high gauges of 24 and up to 1/4 inches.

It is normally preferred by the users who normally do automotive welds or other household common welds as this welder has the capacity to weld almost any metal except Aluminum and Magnesium as it only provides DC power.

Let us remind you that Forney Easy Weld 298 is an extremely lightweight Arc welder which makes it extensively portable to carry out welding tasks almost anywhere and at any place.

This machine comes along with 1-year of parts warranty and can be easily installed and bring on to functioning in no time.

The great thing about this Arc welder is that it is Tig capable and a stick welder at the same time and user have hardly complained about the quality and regarding the functionality of Forney Easy Weld 298 as it performs what it says.

So this can be a Best arc welder for beginners and extremely inexpensive welder option if you are trying to put your hands into welding and getting to know about it then this is, definitely the best welder for beginner as in the start or as amateur, you never want to put great amount of money into heavy duty welders when you hardly know anything regarding welding.

Check On Amazon

Lincoln Electric K2185-1 Handy MIG Welder is an impressive option for beginners. It is famous for its durability and premium quality. If you are looking for the best welder for beginner in terms of small welding project and household purposes then this welder is definitely a thumbs up.

It comes with handy accessories like mask etc and offers Adjustable wire feed speed control which helps in welding materials of different sizes and thicknesses.

You can utilize it as a MIG welder or weld flex-cored and the good thing about this beginner MIG welder is that it can easily switched to both modes in no time.

It is also a portable and lightweight MIG welder which weighs only about 26 pounds making it more easy to carry MIG Welder.

Another cool thing regarding this MIG welder is that it offers a DC output of 88 amps, which means that it can perform heavy duty tasks easily but still cannot perform industrial tasks yet it can perform heavy duty tasks in this price range.

The setup is easy and the controls are advance yet user-friendly due to which it becomes best welder for beginners as users can perform all kinds of welds, learn, and move on to advance welders.

Best Arc for Beginner

Campbell Hausfeld WS099001AV

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 15.25 x 7.75 x 10.25 inches
  • Weight: 24 pounds
  • Power Source: Cordless-electric
  • Voltages: 115V
  • Duty Cycle: 20% at 50A
Check On Amazon

If you are totally a beginner and just want to learn welding on low cost machine then this machine is ideal. It is one of the best Arc Stick Welder for beginners. We have included this machine as few of members would like to buy machine which is extremely low on price and performs low duty welds as well.

The good thing about this Arc/Stick welding machine is that it offers dual heat settings to weld little bit thicker metals. Warranty life is better of this product which is 5-years long so you will not face any issue in this field.

It offers 20% duty cycles at 50A and also offers thermal overload protection to protect overheating and provides easy start as well.

It will also provide you comfort of auto shutting off when reaching out to heating capacity. Apart from this, Campbell machines are always easy to use and ideal choice for beginners.

So this will be the good welder for beginners, not top of the line, but will carry out all the basic welding tasks easily and will give you the basic learning experience as well.

Pros
  • Affordable
  • Welds mild or stainless steel
  • Runs on standard 115V power
  • Durable metal welder with comfort fit handle
  • Dual heat settings
  • Thermal overload protection to prevent overheating
Cons
  • Not top of the line welder just good for beginners
Check Price on Amazon
FAQ’s

It is possible to weld aluminum with a Best stick welder for beginners but the process can be messy due to which these methods are used:

  • AC TIG
  • DC TIG
  • MIG welding

The best method for welding aluminum is AC and TIG utilizing helium or argon mix. In this way it will provide the cleanest weld.

There are several places to buy MIG welders. The best places to buy good MIG welder for beginners are physical stores situated at your nearest location, Amazon, and eBay. People usually recommend buying it online.

There are plenty of MIG welding machines available in the store to buy but the best one and mostly recommended and used by professionals in the starting line is the Hobart 500559 Handler 140.

You can select TIG welder of any size but usually smaller, compact, and lightweight TIG welder are preferable and best TIG welders for beginners which are easy to carry and portable as well and perform all the heavy duty tasks easily.

Conclusion

So these were the best welders for beginner. There are plenty of welding machine available in the market but you have to select according to your needs, requirement, and budget.

We recommend that you should go for high end machines in the beginning so that you get aware of all those features that more heavy duty machines have. There are definitely few welding machines which are built for heavy duty tasks in this list as well.

If you want to go for the best welding machines in the start we straightforwardly recommendAHP AlphaTIG 200X, Primeweld, and Hobart series. Check each of them thoroughly and make best decision for your need and requirements.
